name: Baby In the Sand - Swimming & Play for Girl & Kids Game
name_original: Baby In the Sand - Swimming & Play for Girl & Kids Game
description: Baby Lulu's family has planned a tropical summer vacation, and they want to spend the entire trip on the beach. But before they can depart for their fabulous family vacation, Baby Lulu needs to clean her room and pack her bags! Help Baby Lulu get her luggage together so that she can go to the beach with her family in this fun online caring game for girls. Baby Lulu can't wait to play around on the beach, building sandcastles and splashing in the ocean. When she's not up and running around, you can find her relaxing on a lounge chair while sipping on a fruity juice drink and wearing trendy sunglasses. Pay close attention to Baby Lulu's needs and give her what she wants to keep her happy!
